title: Forgot Password - Cannot log into Pixel. Keeps prompting me to Authenticate via Number on Old phone
content:
Trying to login on a new Pixel 3a. Cannot remember my password. 

Any attempt to sign in tells me to authenticate by hitting a number on my pixel device. but my Pixel device is not signed in.

Attempting to password reset has resulted in this message:
If you sent that request, you don't need to take any action. We'll investigate your account and respond to you within a few days.

Probably due to the fact that I am away from home on business.
Need to set up my phone with my account as it has all my contacts associated to it.

Please help!
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
